title: GPM6B
text:
Neuronal membrane glycoprotein M6-b is a <a href="protein">protein</a> that in <a href="humans">humans</a> is encoded by the "GPM6B" <a href="gene">gene</a>.
In melanocytic cells, GPM6B gene expression may be regulated by <a href="Microphthalmia-associated%20transcription%20factor">MITF</a>.
